name: Hentai Hexa Puzzle
description:
Hentai Hexa Puzzle is a Tetris style puzzle casual game. The goal is to drag pieces to board and fill up all grids.

Solving puzzles to unlock the cute girl pictures and steam achievements.

This game is aiming to make you relax and have fun.

If you feel confused with a level, please click the hint button.Features:
  • Over 100 levels
  • Nice artwork
  • Relaxing music
  • Easily play game
  • Gallery
  • Achievements worth collecting
